bibl.title: Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I
bibl.note: ARZT-GRABNER Peter, The International Project "Papyrological Commentaries on the New Testament" ("Papyrologische Kommentare zum Neuen Testament") - Methods, Aims, and Limits.
